extendedInfo.description: Watch thousands of clips and selected full episodes from Discovery Channel shows like Deadliest Catch, Gold Rush, MythBusters, and more!Download the all-new Discovery Channel app and take Discovery everywhere you go! FULL EPISODESWatch full Discovery Channel episodes, straight from the app!THOUSANDS OF CLIPSCheck out custom-curated playlists, watch the hottest clips from all of Discoveryâs shows, and share your favorites with friends on Facebook, Twitter and email!SCHEDULEFind out when your favorite show is on, and make sure you never miss an episode!

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Don\'t make a mistake and NOT get this app. It is one of the best out there. Beautifully made, great idea
reviews.author: David Willis

reviews.title: Free tv app
reviews.comment: No subscribtion and some sneek peeks with a few full shows perfect. Those complaining about ads are air heads, productions cost $$$.
reviews.author: Marcus J

reviews.title: Does not work on Gs3
reviews.comment: Will not even start up and keeps crashing my phone.  Who are my reports going to anyways?  Cuz no one has fixed it yet! Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Justin Willis

reviews.title: App Won\'t Open
reviews.comment: You think an organization like Discovery Channel could put together an app that actually works!  I, like many other posters here, am unable to open the app...what gives?  Looking at the comments it seems this issue has been going on for well over a month.
reviews.author: Martin Marshall

reviews.title: Commercials
reviews.comment: Same commercial interrupts your video every 3 minutes, seriously?! Very annoying.
reviews.author: Keleka Hwnboi

reviews.title: More commercials please!
reviews.comment: Ok I watch Discovery shows all the time so I love the app but come on!!! You watch one minute of commercials to watch two minutes of a clip of a show. Really? Like I said you need to add more commercials so then that\'s all there is to watch on here! Less commercials and then I will give it five stars. Till then shame on you Discovery!!!
reviews.author: Nathan Straus

reviews.title: Ok interface
reviews.comment: Ok interface but its terrible to watch 1 min of the same stupid commercial for 2 min of footage. If your going to torture us with so many commercials at least change it up! Overall it Needs less commercials so you can actually follow the show. Other than that it seemed like a decent app. Till it takes a chill on the commercials I\'m getting rid of it.
reviews.author: Andrew adams

reviews.title: Discovery Channel app
reviews.comment: This app has more commercials than actual footage. How sad. Along with their programs for people with very low intelligence this is the final blow. Goodbye Discovery channel
reviews.author: Terry Cobb

reviews.title: Video player is junk!
reviews.comment: Of all the viewing apps from major TV networks, this one by far has the worst video player. Every time that a full episode reaches what would normally be a commercial break the video goes black, loops the last second of audio, and keeps doing this for up to a minute. Usually if you are patient, you\'re video will resume, but not always.   I would expect much better quality coming from Discovery. The video player layout and disorganization of video clips and full episodes is really horrible.
reviews.author: Mike Parker

reviews.title: Lies..
reviews.comment: In the description it says full episodes, only shows 1 to 2 min of a video, I tried 3 different shows n there all the same length..waste of time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ads ads ads!!!
reviews.comment: This app is nothing but a way for Discovery to make money from advertising. Each video is like 20 seconds long surrounded by 2 min of commercial advertising. Don\'t bother.
reviews.author: Ryan Waldron

reviews.title: No bueno...
reviews.comment: Poor quality... no video only audio... What\'s the point in downloading? Waste of time
reviews.author: Az Mami

reviews.title: Shark week
reviews.comment: I love watching sharks hunt and I want too tag and swim with bull sharks and great whites.GO SHARKS.
reviews.author: Kristina Kovac

reviews.title: Nexus 7 / 2012
reviews.comment: Was really looking forward to this but after watching the same commercial every 120 seconds, uninstalled.
reviews.author: Jim Farmer

reviews.title: HTC One SV
reviews.comment: I have an HTC One SV and every time I try to play a video it will say \"cannot play video\" can ya\'ll fix that because I really love to watch discovery channel\'s episodes. Thank you
reviews.author: Yadhira Jaimes

reviews.title: Constantly errors out
reviews.comment: This app is constantly shutting it self down due to errors on my VZW GS3.  Very annoying when I find a video I re ally want to watch.
reviews.author: Douglas Peterson

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: Whoever put good reviews is a liar, this app won\'t even open
reviews.author: Kristina Mull

reviews.title: Kickass
reviews.comment: Sweet.                            M
reviews.author: Raechel Mccarthy

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works fine.  It has a strange white boarder on the bottom of most screens.  Not sure if it\'s wasted space or something else.  No chrome cast support yet.
reviews.author: Sean McMahon

reviews.title: Too many ads
reviews.comment: Barely any full episodes. Most clips are around 3-5mins long followed by an ad. This is really annoying. I rather have a full episodes with longer ads in between segments or during alotted commercial breaks.
reviews.author: David Montoya
